outline: Rami, a young Muslim man, is preparing for his wedding with Sara while fulfilling a queer sexuality in secret due to a strict religious and cultural upbringing.
title: The Wedding (2018)

outline: A woman in Harlem desperately scrambles to prove her fiancé innocent of a crime while carrying their first child.
title: If Beale Street Could Talk (2018)

outline: In a post-apocalyptic world where cities ride on wheels and consume each other to survive, two people meet in London and try to stop a conspiracy.
title: Mortal Engines (2018)

outline: A 90-year-old horticulturist and WWII veteran is caught transporting $3 million worth of cocaine through Michigan for a Mexican drug cartel.
title: The Mule (2018)

outline: Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his reality and crosses paths with his counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all reality.
title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018)

outline: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.
title: Deadpool 2 (2018)
